description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension, with installation of 2no front roof lights to facilitate loft conversion. Replacement of flat roof on existing two storey side extension with pitched roof.
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension, with installation of 2no front roof lights to facilitate loft conversion, replacement of flat roof on existing two storey side extension with pitched roof falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

The PDF application form does not include the field to enter a proposal description as you had selected no building works. You will need to amend your planning application on the Planning Portal. You will need your login details. Guidance can be found here: https://www.planningportal.co.uk/services/help/making-an-online-application/amendments
